content: Bollywood’s passive-aggressive attitude towards Hinduism | IndiaFacts ,http://,bit.ly/2JMm653, , via ,@,IndiaFactsOrg
In the name of broad-mindedness Hindus have been made to believe that it is okay to make fun of their gods.
But then, if it is okay to make fun of gods, why isn’t it okay to make fun of a Muslim god or a Christian god (in India) or a Sikh guru? Theatres will be burned, and people will be killed.
